examples: The two groups agreed to cooperate with each other.
Los dos grupos acordaron cooperar entre sí.
They had cooperated closely in the planning of the project.
Habían cooperado estrechamente en la planificación del proyecto.
Their captors told them they would be killed unless they cooperated.
Sus captores les dijeron que los matarían a menos que cooperaran.
The company has agreed to cooperate with the employment survey.
La empresa ha aceptado cooperar con la encuesta de empleo.
